Reviews.Content: initially trouble finding hotel façade isnt facing nathan road eventually found nathan hotel beside coffee shop booked nathan expected clean bathroom freshsmelling curtains spotless bed linens tidy carpet internet free fast switches lights confusing bit trial error fine breakfast food located top floor wide selection breakfast food found breads table setting average complaint charging electronic gadgets time limited power outlet elevator functional stay wait bit time andor location short walks nearest mtr station money changers convenience stores bus stop complimentary shuttle airport express kowloon station nathan hotel surely value money
